title: OT71: I Don’t Open Things
summary:
Key ideas
- This is a visible open thread where users can post about anything they want 
- Google has indicated that SSC has been hacked, though the technical team denies it
- A Discord server for SSC has been established by user deluks917
- The blog features an ad for Hi-Phi Nation, a philosophy podcast

Key learnings
- Users of the blog have engaged in lively, informative debates in response to recent posts
- The technical team has investigated Google's assertion that SSC has been hacked and found no evidence of it

Key questions
- How can Google be convinced to remove its warning about a hack of SSC?
- Will users prefer to use the new Discord server, or will they stick with IRC?
- What directions will debates follow in response to future blog posts?
